backend/main.mo: Defines data types for games, questions, media, and localization plus helper functions to convert backend objects into language-specific simplified forms, storing all content in in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and Tailwind layers for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with audio bridge detection script, root mount point, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing app‑shell caching, stale‑while‑revalidate asset strategy, and navigation fallback for offline use.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview document describing features, offline support, and the audio system including Android WebView bridge requirements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers, page navigation, age selection, and background music control.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicS: Empty file placeholder for a modal component to select background music tracks.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Modal that displays confetti, trophy graphic, encouragement text, and optional quiz results when a level is completed.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Interactive coloring canvas supporting drawing, undo history, zooming, gestures, and template loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with decorative icons and a link to the privacy policy, using translations for text.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Logic puzzle game that generates age‑appropriate number puzzles, tracks progress, and reports completion.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Generates age-specific math problems and tracks score through a fixed number of questions. Supports restart triggers and provides multiple choice answers with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Implements a memory matching game with many emoji themes and age‑based card sets. Manages flipping, matching, scoring, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Presents scenario-based problem‑solving questions from backend or fallback data and tracks progress across categories. Handles answer checking, scoring, and category switching.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Runs a timed reaction game where players tap the correct emoji target among distractors. Difficulty scales by age group and the game tracks rounds, score, and restart triggers.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Creates shape‑matching puzzles using configurable rules per age level, generating paired shapes with varying attributes. Tracks matches, moves, levels, and completion.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Interactive sorting game that shuffles items, tracks remaining items, validates category selections, and triggers completion when all are sorted.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Find‑the‑differences game that generates random difference points, tracks found spots, switches scenes, and completes when all differences are discovered.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding, language selector, music controls, and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown language selector allowing users to switch app language with flags and names.
frontend/src/components/MusicControlsPop: Popover for selecting background music, toggling music and sound effects, and choosing tracks.
frontend/src/config/audioConfig.ts: Configures Android‑only audio mode detection and exposes a helper to check whether WebView bridge audio should be used exclusively.
frontend/src/contexts/AudioSettingsConte: Provides global state for background music and SFX mute settings, syncing values with localStorage and the audio service.
frontend/src/contexts/BackgroundMusicCon: Manages selected background music track with persistence and exposes setters via React context.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Stores the app's current language, persists it, maps it to backend language enums, and provides context accessors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppBackgroundMusic: Controls background music playback with Android-WebView awareness, user-interaction gating, and prevention of redundant restarts.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundAudio.ts: Starts background audio only after user interaction and avoids restarting the same track on re-renders with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageCache.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity React context and provider for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data‑fetching hooks using react-query to load games, questions, encouragement messages, and other content from a backend actor based on age group and language.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: React-query hook that fetches randomized quiz questions from the backend for a given age group and count.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining a colorful child-friendly theme, base styles, and custom animations.
Exports a list of background music options with IDs and labels.
frontend/src/lib/coloringFallbackTemplat: Provides offline fallback coloring templates mapped by age group, each with strict outline-only requirements.
frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Generates and stores a deterministic daily surprise game per age group using localStorage and seeded selection.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Contains large fallback pools of quiz questions in multiple languages organized by age group.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Empty placeholder module for image caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/localizedText.ts: Resolves a backend LocalizedText object into a string for a given UI language with English fallback.
frontend/src/lib/logicPuzzleFallback.ts: Provides fallback time-based logic puzzles in Turkish and English by age group with randomized selection and difficulty levels.
Defines age‑grouped fallback problem‑solving scenarios in Turkish, grouped by categories with options and correct answers.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Implements quiz question randomization with history tracking to reduce repeats and manage session-sized selections.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRoundConfi: Generates shape‑matching round configs based on age and level, adjusting pair counts, shape sets, and rule features.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRules.ts: Defines matching rules for shapes with evaluation logic and filters rules by minimum age group.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationIt: Provides age‑based item pools and categories for a sorting/classification game using fruits, vegetables, animals, vehicles, and objects.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationSe: Utility functions to select randomized, non-repeating sorting/classification items per age group, with validation and localStorage tracking.
frontend/src/lib/sounds.ts: Defines canonical sound ID lists and type-safe validators for SFX and background audio resources.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Contains the shared translation dictionary and language type definitions for UI strings across multiple languages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Coloring zone page that loads templates (backend or fallback), handles image errors, and displays or edits a selected coloring template.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Game zone page that loads available games, manages selected game state, and handles celebration flow after level completion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing welcome text, age selection, and navigation to games, quizzes, or coloring sections.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: Quiz game page that loads backend or fallback questions, tracks quiz state, handles answers, scoring, language, and sound effects.
frontend/src/services/audio.ts: Audio service handling SFX and background music with Android WebView bridges and web fallbacks, including mute and validation logic.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Type definitions for Android WebView audio bridges for background music and sound effects.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration including theme extensions, plugins, colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current language-switching issues, requirements, and architectural notes.
